mapper.select: SELECT news_no,subject,content,poster,regdate,hit,like_cnt,hate_cnt,member_id,num FROM (SELECT news_no,subject,content,poster,regdate,hit,like_cnt,hate_cnt,member_id,row as num FROM (SELECT news_no,subject,content,poster,regdate,hit,like_cnt,hate_cnt,member_id FROM news)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
